summary:
Skills:
•	Specialist in Product and Plant Safety - Expert National Quality Infrastructure and Institutional Building - Risk and Conformity Assessment - CE Consulting - Transposition and Implementation of EU Product Safety Legislation
•	Specialist Strategist / Standardization, Conformity Assessment and Accreditation advisor to Government Institutions in the field of New Approach and New Legislative Framework
•	Technical Planning – Strategic Development of National Quality Infrastructure / Report Writing / Presentation Skills
•	Experienced manager of Technical Assistance and Twinning Projects
•	Expert in accession criteria and requirements (EPA, ACAA), especially in the field of Quality Infrastructure (Standardisation, Accreditation, Conformity Assessment, Metrology, Market Surveillance and Transposition / Implementation of EU legislation
•	Accreditation assessor of certification bodies offering evaluation services related to the New Approach (ISO-IEC 17020, 17021, 17024, 17025, 17065)
•	Assessor of designation criteria for Notified Bodies
•	Expert in WTO Technical Barriers to Trade Agreement
•	Expert in EU and WTO Procurement
•	Expert in European legislation/New Approach/Global Approach as Consultant to the EU for the Safety of Machinery and Low Voltage Equipment in preparation, adoption and application of standards
•	Expert in the following New Approach Directives: Machinery, Low Voltage, Cableway installations designed to carry persons, Pressure Equipment, Simple Pressure Vessels, EMC, ATEX, Use of work equipment at the workplace, Noise outdoors, (Food) Hygiene design and measures, Energy Efficiency, Product Liability, WEEE, RoHS, Integrated product policy (including environmental aspects, eco-design), including risk assessment and risk reduction of a variety of products covered by these Directives and Regulations
•	Profound knowledge of all type A and most type B and C standards supporting the Machinery Directive and related Conformity Assessment

education.degree_name: Diploma Safety for Operational Supervisors SCC
education.field_of_study: Management of Occupational Health and Safety – Registered Safety Expert
Business Administration of Metal Working Enterprises

projects.title: EU project ‘Study on the functions and effects of European standards and standardization in the EU and EFTA Member States’.
projects.description: Provision of consulting services in the international and European standardization, conformity assessment and market surveillance, relevant EU regulations, standardization processes and procedures, especially in the field of machinery. Performing a case study on the social and economic impact of the application of standards by economic operators.

projects.title: Saudi Arabia ‘Institutional Building in the fields of Standardization, Certification, and Metrology of the Saudi Standards, Metrology and Quality Organization (SASO)’.
projects.description: Assistance in drafting Saudi product safety legislation in line with the EU acquis, and preparation of the set of national standardization rules and procedures for the standards adoption and development process to enable SASO to run its standards and CA activities according to EU model.

projects.title: EU project ‘Support to the Quality Infrastructure Framework within a DCFTA context in the Republic of Moldova’.
projects.description: Provision of specific training in the fields of free movement of goods and market surveillance to prepare Moldovan MS authorities for further association with the EU.

projects.title: EU project ‘Facility for the implementation of the Association Agreement in Georgia’.
projects.description: Support to the Georgian Ministry of Economy and Sustainable Development on making the decision of entering into an Agreement on Conformity Assessment and Acceptance of Industrial Products (ACAA).

projects.title: SIDA/EFTA project ‘Quality Infrastructure in the Western Balkans - Component: Support to Industry in the Western Balkans’.
projects.description: Field of activity: Electrical and Electronic Equipment (EEE). Informing and educating producers (for domestic, regional and EU/EFTA markets), and exporters in the Western Balkans on the EU requirements and legislation in the EEE sector to provide knowledge for exporting products to the EU and EFTA markets. Drafting of a guidance booklet for economic operators on EEE.

projects.title: EU Egypt Industry Project (TDMEP-I) - Technical Assistance on Industrial Development and Quality Infrastructure.
projects.description: Support to the Egyptian Government (mainly Ministry of Trade & Industry (MTI) to implement the trade and domestic market related reforms aiming at improving the QI necessary for trade liberalization and free movement of goods especially towards the EU market.

projects.title: EU-China Trade Project (EUCTP) ‘Support to China’s Sustainable Trade and Investment System’.
projects.description: Development of China’s QI through expert exchanges, workshops, seminars, internships and study visits, comparative studies, and personal exchanges between EU and China institutions in the fields of energy efficiency, consumer product safety, intellectual property rights, industry sectors (automotive, cosmetics, e-health, ICT, electrical products, medical devices, pharmaceuticals, pressure equipment, textiles and toys.

projects.title: ENPI Twinning project MD10/ENP-PCA/TR/08 “Strengthening of the capacity of the accreditation centre in the field of conformity assessment of products in the Republic of Moldova”.
projects.description:
Objective: Preparation for ACAA. The overall objective of this project is to improve the trade competitiveness of the Republic of Moldova (further – Moldova) and to harmonize the quality infrastructure with international and European standards. The purpose of this project is to prepare Moldova’s Accreditation Centre (CAECP) in the Field of Conformity Assessment of Products for signing multilateral agreements with the European co-operation for Accreditation and to establish the conditions for the future international recognition of Moldovan accredited test results, calibration certificates, inspection reports and conformity certificates.
Notification letter received August 2011. Implementation date postponed to May 2012. Project duration 30 months including 3 months extension.

contributors.headline: Freelance expert in quality management, accreditation and conformity assessment
International consultant: Quality infrastructure, TBT, accreditation, standards, INetQI chair 2018-2020

projects.title: Programme to Support the Implementation of the Morocco-UE Association-Twinning project MA07/AA/TR10 “Appui à la Direction de la Normalisation et de la Promotion de la Qualité dans l’harmonisation et la mise en œuvre de la législation technique”.
projects.description:
English title: "Support the direction of standardization and quality promotion in the harmonization and the implementation of the technical legislation"
Objective: Preparation for ACAA. To contribute to the facilitation of the trade and the diversification of the exchanges between the Kingdom of Morocco and the European Union (EU) through a support to the Moroccan administration for the preparation of an agreement on the evaluation of conformity and the acceptance of the industrial products (Agreement on Conformity Assessment and Acceptance of industrial products - ACAA).
Specific Objective: To implement a Moroccan technical legislation harmonized with the European legislation in the fields of the electrical appliance, machines, construction products and measuring instruments: Low Voltage Directive (73/23/CEE), Construction Products Directive (89/106/CEE) and Measuring Instruments Directive (2004/22/CE).
Notification letter received October 2007. Project duration 30 months, from January 2009 until June 2011, including 3 months extension.

contributors.headline: Senior Product Compliance and Technical Regulations Consultant
Independent consultant. Former Head of National Enquiry Point WTO/TBT & Directive 98/34/EC, PCP Regulation (EC) 764/2008
Senior product safety expert at VWA

projects.title: Tacis Twinning project UA06/PCA/TR/07 "Strengthening Activities of The National Accreditation Agency of Ukraine (NAAU)"
projects.description:
General Objective: Preparation for ACAA . The Overall Objective of this twinning is to accelerate the adoption and proper enforcement of a conformity assessment system comparable with EU rules primarily in the priority sectors identified for the Agreement on Conformity Assessment and Acceptance of industrial products (ACAA) and also in other specific sectors and areas. It will focus on the highest priority Directives of the ACAA agreement and will also provide support to NAAU in accomplishing its mission in the non-harmonised and voluntary private sectors.
The purpose of the Project is to build up the knowledge among the Ukrainian industry, vendors and national authorities about the importance of conformity assessment requirements in priority areas, first of all those covered by the New Approach Directives and to increase the competence and capacity of NAAU to assess the competence of laboratories, certification and inspection bodies etc. Priority attention will be given to the accreditation in the four New Approach Directives: Electro Magnetic Compatibility (EMC), Low Voltage equipment (LVD), Machinery and Simple Pressure Vessels.
Notification letter received January 2008. Project duration 30 months including 3 months extension.

contributors.headline: Principal Consultant & Director with THE ASSESSMENT REGISTER - completing over 700 x ISO 9001 accredited certification projects... starting with BS 5750, through to AS 9100, ISO 17025, ISO 27001, ISO 9001 and Nadcap
Senior Product Compliance and Technical Regulations Consultant
Owner & consultant at De Wieme BV
Consultant European Directives for Machinery and Lifts
Freelance expert in quality management, accreditation and conformity assessment
Team Leader at Raad voor Accreditatie
Operational Manager Calibration Laboratory at Royal Netherlands Meteorological Institute - KNMI

profile_positions.description: Cooperation with, participation in and management of economic operators and provision of all other kinds of management services

profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description: EU Project “Facility for the Implementation of the Association Agreement in Georgia - EuropeAid/136107/DH/SER/GE”, activity “Support to the Georgian Ministry of Economy and Sustainable Development (MoESD) on the feasibility of entering into an Agreement on Conformity Assessment and Acceptance of Industrial Products (ACAA) as a follow-up to the Association Agreement/Deep and Comprehensive Trade Area (AA/DCFTA)”. Talks with stakeholders on benefits from, and chances offered by, closer economic cooperation with the EU, as a logical follow-up to the AA/DCFTA.
profile_positions.title: Short-Term Expert

profile_positions.description: Series of seminars on exporting electrical and electronic equipment to the EU. Series of seminars on Type-Approval of whole electrical vehicles and electronic sub-assemblies for the EU market, dealing with e and E marking, automotive CE marking, UN R10 EMC, UN GTR20 new developments, after-market products, battery technology and automotive hydrogen technology, including hydrogen service stations
profile_positions.title: Lecturer/Expert

profile_positions.description: Informing and educating producers (for domestic, regional and EU/EFTA markets) and exporters in the Western Balkans about the EU requirements and legislation in the EEE sector (Electrical & Electronic Equipment covered by LVD, EMCD and related EU legislation) to provide knowledge for exporting products to the EU and EFTA markets. To prepare a guidance booklet for producers and importers on EEE and to train regional experts in conformity assessment of EEE so that they, in turn, can train producers and importers of EEE
profile_positions.title: Lecturer/Expert Product Safety & Conformity Assessment

profile_positions.description:
Trade & Domestic Market Enhancement Programme (TDMEP-I), EuropeAid/135294/IH/SER/EG, total project budget € 6,500,000. 
The general objective of the Trade & Domestic Market Enhancement Programme is to assist the Ministry of Trade and Industry in the implementation and execution of key policy reforms in order to sustain economic development and Egypt's further integration onto the global and regional economy. The specific objectives of the Programme are to implement trade and domestic market related reforms that will 1) increase Egypt's benefit from international trade policy and agreements, and 2) foster industrial development, in particular improve the quality infrastructure necessary for trade liberalisation, especially towards the EU market.
The industrial development and quality infrastructure component of TDMEP will focus on industrial quality, the alignment of quality infrastructure bodies to international standards and the harmonization of the technical regulations in Egypt with a view to reach the technical eligibility for opening ACAA negotiations with the EU. As a result, activities in this component are expected to foster exports of Egyptian industrial products to the EU, while at the same time improving the domestic market conditions.
It is the task of the Key Expert to strengthen institutional structures and technical capacities of quality infrastructure institutions by recommending a modified structure to remove conflicts and redundancies among existing institutions, restructuring the National Quality Council and support to the implementation of Egypt's National Quality Strategy, strengthening the national conformity assessment structure & market control strategy and policy, developing a unified national quality law, providing TA to the Ministry to design and develop a national conformity assessment model in sectors related to ACAA, and strengthening the national accreditation body EGAC.
profile_positions.title: Key Expert Quality Infrastructure
Key Expert Quality Infrastructure & Technical Barriers-to-Trade

profile_positions.description:
Managing EU Technical Assistance and Twinning projects

Expertise in product and plant safety, Machinery, Low Voltage, Pressure Equipment Directive & Work Safety issues. 
Specialist in safe product design, risk assessment, technical file, information on safe use
Expert Quality Infrastructure, i.e. Standardization, Conformity Assessment, Accreditation, EU Legislation, Metrology and Market Surveillance
profile_positions.title: Manager International Projects and Senior Consultant EU Technical Legislation
